articles.title: Moose that forced closure of New York hiking trail is put down after showing signs of deteriorating health - CBS News
articles.description: Experts determined euthanasia to be the most humane course of action, given the moose's condition and low likelihood of survival, officials said.
articles.content: A bull moose whose lingering presence around an Adirondack mountain hiking trail this summer forced its closure was euthanized after showing signs of severely deteriorating health, New York environme… [+2522 chars]
